extension_description.message: Easily override the browser's User-Agent string

option_badge_text.message: Show User-Agent as badge text on icon?
option_badge_text.description: Text of checkbox option to show/hide the two to four letter abbreviations displayed ontop of the browser action icon

option_popup_override_size.description: Text of checkbox option to force the extension popup to a static/larger size than it would normally be according to the browser defaults (note that this also has a description attached)

option_popup_override_size_description.message: Enable if popup is rendered too small on your device
option_popup_override_size_description.description: Description text of checkbox option to force the extension popup to a static/larger size than it would normally be according to the browser defaults

option_random_jitter.description: Text of numeric option (0-100) for setting by how many per-cent the random-interval value should (on avarage) be varied

options_entries_caption.description: Header text of the entries editor in the extension options

options_entries_reset.description: Options page link for loading the entries defaults

options_entries_reset_undo_text.description: Text of popup that is shown after the reset link has been clicked

options_entries_reset_undo_button.description: Label of button for undoing a reset (displayed below the text that asserts that the options have just been reset)

options_entries_switch_text.description: Options page link for switching from table to text mode

options_entries_switch_table.description: Options page link for switching from text to table mode

options_entries_heading_enabled.description: Options page table editor heading for the column allowing to enabled or disable items

options_entries_heading_label.description: Options page table editor heading for the column with user-facing User-Agent-String labels

options_entries_heading_category.description: Options page table editor heading for the column with general category of the given User-Agent-String

options_entries_heading_string.description: Options page table editor heading for the column with the actual server-reported User-Agent-Strings

useragent_category_desktop.description: Default category label for browsers on desktop devices

useragent_category_mobile.description: Default category label for browsers on mobile devices

useragent_category_bot.description: Default category label for search engine bots

useragent_category_other.description: Default category label for unclassified client software

icon_title_random.description: Text displayed in the browser action icon tooltip when the User-Agent header is choosen at random

icon_title_enabled.description: Text displayed in the browser action icon tooltip when request processing is being done because of the global setting

icon_title_disabled.description: Text displayed in the browser action icon tooltip when no request processing is being done because of the global setting

icon_title_override_enabled.description: Text displayed in the browser action icon tooltip when request processing is being done because of an override being set

icon_title_override_disabled.description: Text displayed in the browser action icon tooltip when no request processing is being done because of an override being set

popup_item_options.description: The label of the menu item for opening the extension's preference page

popup_item_override.description: Label of the checkbox that can be used to switch from setting the global User-Agent string to a per-site value

popup_item_override_tpl.description: Label of an individual selectable override domain

popup_item_random.description: The label of the menu item for enabling time-based User-Agent randomization

popup_item_random_categories.description: The section header of the categories selection of random selection mode

popup_item_random_interval_mode_restart.description: The label of the menu item for enabling the time-based User-Agent randomization only on extension and browser startup

popup_item_random_interval_mode_timed.description: The label of the menu item for enabling the time-based User-Agent randomization at regular intervals

popup_item_default.description: The label of the menu item that disables the User-Agent overrider and lets the browser send its default User-Agent string
